医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
同步血管舒缩增强小鼠大脑功能与计算机相比，大脑可以用非常低的净能量供应来执行计算。然而，我们对生物大脑如何管理能量的理解仍然不完整。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240426/Synchronized-vasomotion-enhances-brain-function-in-mice.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240426/Synchronized-vasomotion-enhances-brain-function-in-mice.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=46b1be6b-8fa3-47a1-8ee7-36027d882c03 Fri, 26 Apr 2024 16:22:00 -0400 Synchronized vasomotion enhances brain function in mice
生活在印度高海拔地区的儿童可能更容易发育迟缓发表在开放获取期刊 BMJ Nutrition 上的研究发现，在印度生活在较高海拔地区会增加生长发育不良的风险，生活在海拔 2000 米或以上家庭的儿童比生活在海拔 1000 米以下家庭的儿童面临的风险高 40%预防与健康。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240426/Children-living-in-higher-altitude-areas-of-India-may-be-more-vulnerable-to-stunted-growth.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240426/Children-living-in-higher-altitude-areas-of-India-may-be-more-vulnerable-to-stunted-growth.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a5bacd67-c85c-4aab-926b-43143ad07150 Fri, 26 Apr 2024 16:13:57 -0400 Children living in higher altitude areas of India may be more vulnerable to stunted growth
西班牙国务卿与世卫组织会面讨论全球卫生优先事项世卫组织于 2024 年 4 月 23 日至 24 日欢迎西班牙卫生大臣哈维尔·帕迪拉·贝尔纳尔德斯先生及其代表团，讨论全球卫生联合优先事项。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240426/Spains-Secretary-of-State-meets-with-WHO-to-discuss-global-health-priorities.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240426/Spains-Secretary-of-State-meets-with-WHO-to-discuss-global-health-priorities.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=8856d181-bd91-4570-a939-52f08c70be80 Fri, 26 Apr 2024 16:09:35 -0400 Spain's Secretary of State meets with WHO to discuss global health priorities
研究强调儿童脑损伤检查的监督一项新的全国性研究发现，近四分之一有脑损伤或脑震荡症状的美国儿童没有接受检查，尤其是年幼的儿童更容易被忽视。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240426/Study-highlights-oversight-in-childhood-brain-injury-checks.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240426/Study-highlights-oversight-in-childhood-brain-injury-checks.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=435d0da1-20bb-41fe-8d7c-14c60cf5c5d9 Fri, 26 Apr 2024 15:58:33 -0400 Study highlights oversight in childhood brain injury checks
数百万人被排除在医疗补助之外。不管怎样，经营它的保险公司还是获得了医疗补助收入。去年，由于禁止各州将任何人从政府计划中剔除的大流行保护措施到期，私人医疗补助计划失去了数百万成员。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240426/Millions-were-booted-from-Medicaid-The-insurers-that-run-it-gained-Medicaid-revenue-anyway.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240426/Millions-were-booted-from-Medicaid-The-insurers-that-run-it-gained-Medicaid-revenue-anyway.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=85cb6374-aa35-47dd-91bd-0d68ef0472bb Fri, 26 Apr 2024 13:28:42 -0400 Millions were booted from Medicaid. The insurers that run it gained Medicaid revenue anyway.
Revvity 开启了自动化结核病检测的新时代Revvity, Inc.（纽约证券交易所代码：RVTY）今天宣布推出 Allsheng 的 Auto-Pure 2400 液体处理器，用于 T-SPOT.TB 测试。 Auto-Pure 2400 平台易于使用，旨在在实验室中提供高效的工作流程。当 T-SPOT.TB 测试的准确性与 Auto-Pure 2400 系统的效率相结合时，实验室、临床医生和最终患者将受益于由此产生的强大解决方案。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240426/Revity-unveils-a-new-era-of-automated-tuberculosis-testing.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240426/Revity-unveils-a-new-era-of-automated-tuberculosis-testing.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=5279c594-4f3a-4cf8-a930-fa53958f3b02 Fri, 26 Apr 2024 09:38:00 -0400 Revvity unveils a new era of automated tuberculosis testing
世卫组织和法国政府主办抗击脑膜炎高级别会议在法兰西共和国总统埃马纽埃尔·马克龙的大力支持下，世界卫生组织和法国政府共同主办了一次高级别会议，全球领导人强调需要战胜脑膜炎这一导致残疾的主要原因。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240426/WHO-and-Government-of-France-host-high-level-meeting-to-combat-meningitis.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240426/WHO-and-Government-of-France-host-high-level-meeting-to-combat-meningitis.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=524a5458-fcd6-4461-96ac-0524b7a34db2 Fri, 26 Apr 2024 07:08:57 -0400 WHO and Government of France host high-level meeting to combat meningitis
世卫组织数据显示，新冠肺炎 (COVID-19) 大流行期间抗生素广泛过度使用世界卫生组织的新证据显示，全球范围内的 COVID-19 大流行期间抗生素的广泛过度使用，这可能加剧了抗菌素耐药性 (AMR) 的“无声”传播。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240426/WHO-data-reveals-extective-antibiotic-overuse-during-COVID-19-pandemic.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240426/WHO-data-reveals-extective-antibiotic-overuse-during-COVID-19-pandemic.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=94171be6-d209-41ce-bc0f-5a4add518b80 Fri, 26 Apr 2024 06:57:25 -0400 WHO data reveals extensive antibiotic overuse during COVID-19 pandemic
加州正在投资 5 亿美元开发针对青少年的治疗应用程序。支持者担心这不会有回报。加利福尼亚州在今年年初推出了两款应用程序，向年轻人提供免费的行为健康服务，帮助他们应对从焦虑生活到身体接受等各种问题。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240426/California-is-investing-24500M-in-therapy-apps-for-youth-Advocates-fear-it-wone28099t-pay-off.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240426/California-is-investing-24500M-in-therapy-apps-for-youth-Advocates-fear-it-wone28099t-pay-off.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=9414483a-d019-4a9e-996a-3f2d896272bb Fri, 26 Apr 2024 06:50:19 -0400 California is investing $500M in therapy apps for youth. Advocates fear it won’t pay off.
英国首项真实世界研究显示 sacituzumab govitecan 在转移性乳腺癌中的应用前景sacituzumab govitecan (SG) 对抗转移性三阴性乳腺癌的现实安全性和有效性。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240426/First-UK-real-world-study-shows-promise-for-sacituzumab-govitecan-in-metastatic-breast-cancer.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240426/First-UK-real-world-study-shows-promise-for-sacituzumab-govitecan-in-metastatic-breast-cancer.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=462f462f-17c3-4946-a900-4755bf7f2096 Fri, 26 Apr 2024 06:42:00 -0400 First UK real-world study shows promise for sacituzumab govitecan in metastatic breast cancer
